basics.name: Harshal Nikhare
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with around 2 years of hands-on experience designing, developing and implementing applications and solutions using a range of technologies with 3 years of IT experience. Seeking to leverage broad development experience and hands-on technical expertise in a challenging role as a Full-Stack Developer.

work.name: Fargowiz Software Services Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Developed 5+ full-stack web applications to analyze and process data for different clients.
highlights: Worked with a team to create a web app for creating surveys (Reactjs, Nodejs, Typescript and MongoDb as Database)
Implemented stripe (webhook) and storing user's payment details (backend)
Automated Google Dialogflow Agent creation process for creating survey using Google Dialogflow
Implemented state management for creating a survey - multiple questions, different question types (MCQ images as option, Q/A) etc. (Reactjs)
Worked with a team to create IVR(Interactive Voice Response) for a recruiting firm. (Nodejs, twilio and MySQL)
Implemented authentication based on voice response speech to text using twilio speech to text APIs.
Implemented new user registration, existing user applying for a job flow for users. (Nodejs and MySql)
Implemented questionaire flow using Google Dialogflow webhook to handle interview process of candidates. (Nodejs and MySql)
Implemented a feature to store user recordings in Google Cloud Storage Bucket to gbe reviewed by recruiting agencies
Worked with a team to create Admin Panel for IVR system. (Reactjs and Nodejs)
Implemented feature for admin to view user recordings and inteview answers with their recordings. (Reactjs)

work.name: Fargowiz Software Services Pvt. Ltd.
highlights: Worked with a team to create a sports procurement application for a client.
Implemented Support role for admins to login as vendors and buyers to help them with RFI (Request for Information) process. (Reactjs and Nodejs)
Implemented a flow to create Tenders for vendors based on different sectors and sports categories. (Reactjs and Nodejs)
Created a cronjob to update leaderboard in a betting application using Nodejs.
Implemented complience assessment system application for client to assess a given complience by user.
Implemented an electron desktop app launcher from scratch which upgrades and launches different applications.
Setup CICD for a project using pipeline integrations in bitbucket to deploy projects to Google Cloud
Designed and created a knowledge management platform utilizing a range of technologies, including Node js, Typescript, React, SQL and Monogodb
Developed and implemented chatbots using google Dialogflow for a survey application.
Work closely with app development team including project and product manager, developers, QA to determine problems, testing methods and best practices.
Played a key role in the development, improvement and operation of web-based software.

work.name: Alacrity E-Commerce Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Worked on various E-commerce websites to manage content on product page and product image, created search term generator and inventory, catalogs on CMS.

education.institution: Priyadarshini Institute of Engineering and Technology
